content: *this christmas blanket is made with mosaic crochet you can join the **free cal starting january 1st 2024 for 12 months** releasing 1 pattern part per month you can choose whether to make this pattern **regular or reversible overlay mosaic crochet** video and photo tutorials for both techniques are provided the pattern includes the written tutorial as well as the graph * > this pattern is part of the year-long > christmas blanket crochet along 2024 to > make a 62x69 inch blanket for > your loved ones or yourself this is > blanket will be done by christmas 2024 > the free cal s pattern includes ads > and the only way to get the > pattern **ad-free and printer-friendly** > is in the **pdf** the **pdf > is cheaper on my website ** > so you can get the pdf here for $12 > or on my website for $10 > the pdf allows you to work at your > own pace as the entire pattern is > included in the pdf >**get the pdf here 1 ** pattern is free with ads on my website here 2 1 part at the time starting january 1st 2024 > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this cal pattern will also be released in my > crochet membership in parts which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership here 3 note the tree panel looks coincidentally similar but not on purpose to the sholach afghan by abigail mcintyre you can get here as a kit 4 or just the pattern here on etsy 5 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/mosaic-crochet-christmas-blanket/ ref=raverly 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/mosaic-crochet-christmas-blanket/ ref=ravelry 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 4 http //shrsl com/47rt1 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sholach-mosaic-afghan
